item.text: Win your readers with custom post types (free types). Cover the upcoming presidential elections in France with post types specifically structured and designed for that purpose. Here we go:
It´s a pleasure to see our new post type "scorecard" in action honouring Lukas Podolski in his last match for the german national team:

Home
Germany
1
  • Podolski
    69
Away
England
0

France presidential elections. Results from 6:34 pm

Marine Le Pen
25,6 %
Emmanuel Macron
27,1 %
François Fillon
18,7 %

How Germany's @zeitonline is using our #LiveBlog to enhance live coverage. https://t.co/dmbLyGOAbR

— Sourcefabric on Twitter (@sourcefabric) https://twitter.com/Sourcefabric/status/835162404094869504

LiveBlogging just got more flexible, fun and profitable! Find out about the new #LiveBlog 3.1 >> https://t.co/4yebiVqCHw

— Sourcefabric on Twitter (@sourcefabric) https://twitter.com/Sourcefabric/status/844166739482968064

Hello Live Bloggers, welcome to our news liveblogged from the producers of Live Blog. What you see is Live Blog in action and the posts are delivered in the look and feel of our Classic theme. By the way - we pinned this post to the timeline, so it always stays on top of all other posts.
Win your readers with custom post types (free types). Cover the upcoming presidential elections in France with post types specifically structured and designed for that purpose. Here we go:

item.text:
The New Live Blog 3.1 is Here - Live Blog pro
The latest release of Live Blog comes with great new features like scorecards for sporting events, analytics and custom-defined blog post types. Over the past few years, Live Blog's fan base has been growing in the world of news media. Christoph Dernbach, head of dpa-Infocom, calls it "a robust, open and flexible tool for live coverage."
Live Blog pro
http://liveblog.pro/live-news-new-live-blog-3-1/
Yes you are right: Mr. Huk
Yes it´s me again. Jan. typo fixed.
Hello, I am Jan Huk.. typo fixed when post was already published.
Hello, this is a post from the Contributor Jan Huk

3 month to lift @Sourcefabric's #opensource #LiveBlog into the cloud, 3 hrs till first booking! Keep them coming :) https://t.co/nuxYwEiMHb

— Gideon Lehmann on Twitter (@gidze3000) https://twitter.com/gidze3000/status/844461698979434496
